name: Acorn Grove
description:
Explore Acorn Grove and find your ingredients. Play some fairground minigames and meet the grove's inhabitants!

This is a game about a day in the life of a gnome living in Acorn Grove. A short but sweet game i made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022. It was made in GB Studio and it is the first real game i've managed to finish. It runs in browser and even on a real Game Boy Color. The rom file is in the downloads.

Controls:

  • Movement = arraw keys / wasd
  • A = Z
  • B = X
  • Start = Enter
  • Select = Shift

Things i might add in the future:

  • Music and sounds
  • Another minigame
  • Custom font and emote bubbles
  • Full asset pack download

If you want to support me, consider donating or buying one of my asset packs :)
